@corlenoe Hi, I am sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. If you receive an alternative that does not suit you, please call our support for further assistance finding a solution for your flight. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

Newark Liberty International: (973) 961-6000

data.text:
@ComradeCrev Hi, I am terribly sorry that you have had issues finding an alternative on our website for your flight. Please call our support for further assistance making your changes to your flight. https://t.co/b3QIqPBI2R
Kind regards, Rebecka

@zhongze10 Hello!
I can not guarantee this. It's something you have to feel out yourself if you have time for depending on the distance, traffic and other factors. I do recommend you eating very close by or preferably at the airport. 

Best regards,
Emilia

If you have the possibility to make your booking on the app or in your phone then we advice you to do that in the meantime, or if you prefer to call in and make your booking:
https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Thank you for bringing attention to this!

Best Regards,
Emilia

data.text: @PetzoldKatja Sorry to hear about your experience with the rebooked flights, but sometime the technique fails
@Luma0066 In case of two separate tickets, it´s two separate check-ins as well. To avoid that have the whole trip on one ticket

urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Anisharingstuff Hi, how fast a offer is made depend on availability and time to departure. If you have not received a offer you can to call in to our support to check for options.   https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj

You choose Country /region and then press Customer service/Eurobonus

Regards,
Peter

@antiorario Hi, 

When there is a schedule change our system send out a notification with the change to the passengers. I can unfortunately not look at bookings here on twitter so i can not see why you have not received the notification in this case. 

Regards,
Peter

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@AdamVShattock Hi, we apologize that the baggage was damaged during transport. If you haven't already - please return to the airport to make a report with Baggage Service so they can help you evaluate the damage and give you a report number which you can use to request compensation.

// Anton.

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

urls.title: SAS Safe Travel – Säkerhet och välbefinnande ombord
urls.description: Säkerheten för våra resenärer och vår personal är alltid vår högsta prioritet. Under denna tid med reserestriktioner är det också viktigt att du förbereder dig för att resa »

data.text:
@SabahMilani Hej, vi har regler på att alla resenärer ska ha på sig en ansiktsmask under resans gång när ni reser utanför Skandinavien. Du hittar informationen om detta här: https://t.co/RWpVwLQoMq - Du hittar svar om medicinska skäl på FAQ längst ner.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@ShiLisa5 Hi, you cannot bring a stroller as an extra cabin luggage, but you can choose to use your stroller as your cabin luggage as long as it is within the size restrictions: 55 cm x 40 cm x 23 cm and weigh up to 8kg.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@ShiLisa5 Hi, SAS does not require any tests to board, however you need to make sure to follow the rules set by each country you travel through and to in order to reach your destination. Please find info here: https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De  and https://t.co/I5lXILKAf5 
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@BosjeR Hi! We are able to assist you with your phone number over Live Chat or by Phone so we can help you recover your eurobonus account. Please find our Live chat or phone number here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@mtwtfish_ Hi, we currently do not have a date as of when we will update the carry on rules for the personal item. You will find the information on our website once the rules have bene updated here: https://t.co/gml5ZaEizi
Kind regards, Rebecka

@aaspedersen Hej, när du bokar om en resa så får du ibland en mellanskillnad om det nya flyget har ett högre pris och vissa bokningar har även en ombokningsavgift. För att få mer hjälp med din ombokning rekommenderar jag att du ringer in till oss: +47 21 89 64 00
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@nusbaiser1 Hi, we currently only allow you to bring 1 piece of carry on luggage, this excludes the backpack. However inside your carry on luggage you may bring everything you need for your child to be able to handle the flight.
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Emily_Holweck Hi, if you still haven't managed to add your pet to your ticket, if it's urgent please contact us on Live Chat or by phone. You can also contact us on Facebook Messenger. Please find our Live chat here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@ErikBergsnev Hej, jag är ledsen att höra att du har haft problem att boka av din resa. Har du fortfarande inte fått möjlighet att boka av den kan du kontakta oss på Live Chatt eller Telefon: https://t.co/cIkJt9kPnF
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@StephWiniecki Hi, I'm am sad to hear that you had technical difficulties with your Ipad when trying to chat with us. Our live chat time out after about 2 minutes of inactivity, we can also assist over the phone as well as Facebook messenger if you have shorter queries.
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@EloMeliMelo Hi, Please set up a damaged bag report by calling our bag service: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2
Once a PIR is created for your bag, you contact our Customer care here: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh 
Request your compensation for the delay here: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@RhyaneWuff Hi, I am sorry to hear that you were unable to find an alternative that suits you. You can contact our support over the phone in order to receive assistance finding an alternative that works for you: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Somoza251 When making your booking on our website, you can check if you can add your dog during the additional service step. If that is unavailable you need to contact us over phone or have a reference and reach us on live chat or FB Messenger https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@Alex_H_Griffin Hi, I am terribly sorry to hear that things were lost from the bag. Did you contact the airport to set up a damaged bag report? If not, you can find our phone numbers to our bag service here: https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2 
Kind regards, Rebecka

@mariecopley Hi Marie
On SAS flights to and from the UK, animals are not allowed to travel in the cabin or as checked baggage with the exception of certain service animals. Emotional support animals are not allowed.
https://t.co/3gok299F3A
We can not help you with this.
Kind regards /Anna
